lead_paragraph: It is now apparent that coach Alvin Gentry's up-tempo, flowing system has caught on in New Orleans, and it looks like the transformation has taken place in time for the surging Pelicans to make a run at a playoff spot.

headline.print_headline: Anderson Scores 36, Leads Pelicans Past Kings, 114-105
headline.main: Anderson Scores 36, Leads Pelicans Past Kings, 114-105
